metaLanguagePatterns.sentence:
**Evidence** - Because my brain still lies to me about reality

## What This Writing Actually Is

This blog isn't wisdom-sharing

**

I write to process experiences I don't understand, to track patterns I'm trying to change, and to build tools for problems I'm still learning to identify
When I write about emotional regulation or conscious parenting, I'm not teaching
But it works for me, just like this writing
